What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Dining Out > Fast Food > Resolved Question ellie Member since: November 16, 2009 Total points: 99 (Level 1) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » What are the duties of a fast food cashier/? i need to write a resume and need to explain the duties of a cashier at a fast food restaurant. 2 years ago Report Abuse by Duckie Member since: January 27, 2008 Total points: 2,264 (Level 3) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker you are writing a resume- and need to ask what some of your duties were? They are: ringing up orders, making change, handing out food, cleaning ( counter area, lobby, bathrooms) stocking ( sauces, fridges/freezers, shake machines, misc. like cups, straws) If you are a drive thru cashier : dishes, table prep, preparing salads, towel buckets. 2 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good Asker's Rating: Asker's Comment: this really helped me out because i did both front and drive tru cashier Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 0 ) Save Add to My Yahoo! Add to Del.icio.us RSS
